description: Pre-transformation John. HS → early college. Family tension, 723-day relationship, early ECD involvement. Building the foundation.

milestones.milestone: Life-altering car accident resulting in panic attacks and anxiety
DODGEBALL 70 (Dec 30) — music experiment with dance anthems
FINS Friday gatherings ongoing since March 2006

turning_points.event: Car accident causing panic attacks and anxiety

description: Reconciliation begins. 'My oh my, how the times have changed.' Crazy Chili Dog post signals inner restlessness.

milestones.milestone: 27 bowling games in a single day
Started job at Ocean Township Recreation (Feb 27)
MU Co-Ed Dodgeball League championship (Nov 19, PondScum)
20+ hours of tennis in one week
Crazy Chili Dog post: dense esoteric reflection on reconciliation, Team Paul (Bobbo + Jimmy), and personal growth. 'My oh my, how the times have changed.'

quotes.quote: Without any hesitation, I proudly proclaim that 2007 was undoubtedly the most colorful and eventful year of my life.
the beginning not of a temporary diet, but a desperate lifestyle alteration
Some day you're gonna look back and be happy you recorded all of this stuff
half of these entries don't make any sense to the reader [or the writer, haha]
Sometimes the door without a sign is the sign

description: The year everything changed. Coming out ('the power of an internal desire liberated!'). ECD peak. New identity forged. Yeah I Said It: 'I've never felt happier to be alive.'

milestones.milestone: First semester of Health Studies completed at MU (May 8)
Diana DiBuccio: Comedian of the Year
Song of the Year: Tom Petty 'Runnin Down a Dream'
First beer shared with The Pops (Aug 21)
Car accident on West Park Avenue (Nov 4)
Came out in 2008; KMJ was 3rd person to know

Yeah I Said It post: raw honest reflection. Reveals 2004 car accident caused panic attacks, 2005 near-anorexia. Letsche friendship repaired at Rumble '08. First appearance of 'The power of an internal desire liberated!' — March 2008.

quotes.quote: Conquered obstacles, dreams turned reality, fears for happy tears
2008: Rewarding, Refreshing, Heavenly. I Did It.
Family First...Friendship takes two, not one.
I said exactly what I needed to say; now I look back with a smile.
Life is Beautiful

turning_points.event: Coming out — 'The power of an internal desire liberated!'

description: Post-threshold navigation. ECD retirement (171 events, legacy secured). College graduation. Career launch at Sunrise. Torn labrum surgery. New friendships forming.

milestones.milestone: Retired from ECD after 171 events and 40 months (Jan 3)
SkyDive I at 10,000 feet (Aug 16) — 'maybe the happiest 24-span of my life'
First concert ever: John Legend at MSG with Kanye West (Aug 13)
Inducted into Eta Sigma Gamma at MU (Dec 16)
62nd WWE event (Hell In A Cell Oct 4)
28 beers consumed all year; 101 dates posted; 0 regrets
Graduated Monmouth University (3.66 major GPA, 3.49 cumulative)
Won inaugural HERO of the Year (Jan 27)
Tennis match vs Farnkopf: 6 hours 7 minutes 3 seconds (Sep 21)
HERO Campaign 10th Anniversary at Trump Taj Mahal (Jul 22)
Brother Michael graduated from Kean University (May 13)
First meal with Rob at Ocean Bay Diner (Jan 1)
Career at Sunrise Senior Living begins (Oct 31/Nov 1)
Survivor Series at MSG — The Rock returns (Nov 20)
Torn glenoid labrum confirmed via MRI (Aug 2)

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is hell trying to get to heaven.
You cannot fear death once you've touched heaven.
Walk the plank, take the jump, and still come up alive. What's a chance if you don't take it.
Friends, Family, Freedom. The Greatest Year Ever. 2009.
It wasn't something I was happy about doing, but it is something I'm happy I did.

description: Deepening identity. The Influlist (crediting origins). Merrie Melodies (mapping friendships to music). Career advancing. WrestleMania streaks continuing.

milestones.milestone: DODGEBOWL 200 — era-ending extravaganza (Aug 10, FIVE star rating)
Norwegian Breakaway — first cruise ever, first with RK (Sep 8-15, FIVE star rating)
Maryland wedding — gave speech, danced 180 minutes (Nov 7-9)
'2010 and 2013 will no doubt stand the test of time'

quotes.quote: the beauty in finality. The wonder of commencement.
the best + the most = .TWENTY '13.
If all keeps up, 2013 could honestly become the greatest year of my adulthood
just woke up from this dream.. but it wasn't a dream!!!
2010 and 2013 will no doubt stand the test of time. The only difference is that now, in '13, I've had someone to share all those amazing times.

description: The most documented year. Undertaker handshake (20-year dream fulfilled through 5 friends). Peak joy. But also peak vulnerability — everything desired has been achieved. Now what?

milestones.milestone: Met The Undertaker at WM XXX (4:10:18 PM CT Apr 5)
Norwegian Epic cruise II — Jamaica, Grand Cayman, Cozumel (Dec 6-15)
Diana's 30th, Valerie's 30th, Pam's 30th, author's 30th — trend of 30s
Cornhole Championship won with Pops at Maggie & Mike's (Aug 30)
Johnny Nash: most influential friend of 2014
The Pops: Comedian of the Year (2nd straight year)

quotes.quote: the committee has spoken, Darrell.
All that keeps running through my head is 'I finally did it.' I never, ever thought the day would come.
10 Years After The First .. 20 Years To Meet The Man.
When you enjoy the journeys, the destinations magnify
The Epic Handshake, and then some.. 2|0'1|4.

description: Quieter years. 2015 under-documented. 2017: spinal surgery — the body rebels. Physical ordeal forces reassessment.

milestones.milestone: Janet Jackson first Artist of the Year win
Dan Spengeman: Comedian of the Year
Lauren Winston: Comedian of the Year
L5-S1 herniation → microdiscectomy surgery (Dec 15) at Riverview hospital
California trip 600+ miles for Matt & Gina wedding
Broken left pinky — volleyball career paused (Mar 26)

quotes.quote: having kids would be a good idea, except that I'm not willing to give up my life
unquestionably, the greatest WWE experience of all-time
Oh my god you're such a huge dork. I read the whole blog!
I Just Want To Wake Up. (I Did!)
1997, 2007, 2015, and now 2017. My personal SummerSlam story, some 20 years long, complete.

description: Post-surgery comeback. Mediterranean cruise. 1,000th CHA game. COVID forces universal pause. Inner strength tested differently.

milestones.milestone: Mediterranean cruise (Slovenia, Italy, Greece, Malta, Croatia — 5 countries, 2 weeks)
Reminiscence Coordinator role at Sunrise of Wall (started Oct 22)
Best tennis comeback: won from 0-6 deficit (Dec 23)
Sisters turned 16 — Six Flags Great Adventure (Aug 27)
Won Weezer tickets as 94.3 radio 9th caller (Nov 26)
Australia & New Zealand — 'the best, the longest, and the greatest' (19 days, Jan 12-31)
U.S. Open: Nadal vs Medvedev final, 3rd longest in 100+ years (Sep 8)
Asian expedition: Singapore, Thailand, Cambodia, Vietnam, Hong Kong (17 days Jan-Feb)
Medical quarantine (Mar 26 – Apr 16) + muscle gain comeback
Assisted Living Manager at Sunrise of Jackson (started Sep 28)
4th skydive (Oct 3, mother witnessed) — 'easiest of the freefalls'
Pasta Passion & Pistols Murder Mystery NYE (Dec 31)

quotes.quote: patience & gratitude
Life, Rejoined. . M M 1 8 .
the best, the longest, and the greatest
What am I getting myself into?
Halfway to 70

description: The mature chapter. Engagement. Executive Director promotion. 20th WrestleMania. Relationship transition in 2025. The elixir is wisdom: 'When you enjoy the journeys, the destinations magnify.'

milestones.milestone: 8.6 lbs shrimp + 7.3 lbs crab meat consumed
Jumped from Stratosphere in Las Vegas
Sr. Resident Care Coordinator promotion (applied Jul 11, accepted Jul 23)
20 years between Rangers games at MSG
Arizona trip: Grand Canyon, Sedona, Flagstaff
Rangers playoff run (triple-OT game at MSG)
Undertaker inducted into Hall of Fame
Super Bowl LVII in Phoenix — 'most spectacular day I've ever experienced'
Closed on house at Mill Creek Court (Dec 18)
Broadway: Hadestown, Aladdin, Chicago (3 shows in one year)
Executive Director role began at Media, PA location (July)
Norway cruise (Alesund, Akureyri, Iceland Sky Lagoon)
4,000-mile Midwest road trip (16 states: Rushmore, Devils Tower, Gateway Arch, Badlands)
Five Boro Bike Tour medal finish
Emotional crisis and relationship transition (late May-early June)

quotes.quote: it's called dedication. look it up.
the notebook doesn't lie, ValPal.
you're welcome for the immortality.
Life went from 9.5 to 9.7 in 10m, 37s
Baby is here. Everyone healthy and safe.
